issue.title: Game starts automatically 5 seconds after player is connected

content.raw:
The [parameters](#!/osrf/robocup3ds/wiki/Configuration%20Variables) are documented in the wiki. 

As far as I understand there are two problems:

* Unexpected transition to `play` after 5 seconds of an agent insertion. What is the expected behavior here?
* It's possible to insert an agent in `play` mode and this shouldn't happen.
content.html:
The parameters are documented in the wiki.

As far as I understand there are two problems:

  • Unexpected transition to play after 5 seconds of an agent insertion. What is the expected behavior here?
  • It's possible to insert an agent in play mode and this shouldn't happen.
